action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application by selecting the default landing page upon login.
notes: Consider setting the landing page to the calendar or inbox to save clicks.

action_item: Users & Roles - Upgrade patient search functionality by unchecking the legacy search box.
notes: This allows for more precise searches by combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the steps outlined to ensure the new password is saved correctly.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Ensure to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order sections like allergies, medications, and lab results for clinical summaries.
